descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Witcher Experience Enhanced v1.2
Author: Talyn82 & Lice23

Contents:
I: Introduction
II: Installation
III: Recommendations
IV: Bugs
V: Credits
VI: Version History


I: Introduction

This mod aims to fix the bugs present in AlphaWolf’s Witcher mod. It also aims to improve upon his already magnificent work. V1.2 addresses the many problems reported by nexus members. Such as broken enchantments and broken weapon stats.

II: Installation

Extract everything except the readme’s to your C:\ProgramFiles(x86)\Steam\Steamapps\Common\Skyrim directory. Check the esm and esp file in data files.  Please read Lice23's Readme for detailed stats on weapons and armor.

III: Recommendations

Alternate Start: Live Another Life: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557

Witcher2 Replace Mod by Witcher5688: http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22054

XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?

IV: Bugs

For some reason the text in the armor and weapon descriptions appear small. Please consult this Lice23's readme for detailed stats. It is possible I forgot something. If so let me know.

V: Credits

Special thanks to AlphaWolf for letting me update his work.

Special thanks to Bethesda for making Skyrim and the Creation Kit.

A very special thanks to CDProjectRed for allowing us to use there assets.

A very special thanks to Lice 23 for rebalancing all weapons and armor, as well as fixing the keywords and crafting recipes.

VI: Version History

1.0: Initial Release. Fixed flames shooting upward. Removed Dawnguard dependacy. Most armors are now craftable. All armors are upgradeable. Rare and Epic armors are only upgradeable.

1.1: All alchemists now sell Witcher ingredients. In villages without alchemists, the tavern keepers sell ingredients. Enchantments on all weapons and armor have been fixed. Fixed craftable leather armors, they should now show up properly on the player. Fixed some grammar errors. Quen now has a 75% chance to reflect damage and is now a once a day power.

1.2: All weapons and armor have been rebalanced.  As well as all crafting recipes have been revised thanks to Lice23.  Also made vampire Geralt race non playable.
author: Talyn82
